definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ne 2:16 remainder, excellence, excess;—abs. [[יֶ֫תֶר]] Ne 2:16 + 2 t.; [[יׇ֑תֶר]] Pr 17:7; cstr. [[יֶ֫תֶר]] Ge 49:3 + 84 t.; [[יֶ֫תֶר]] Is 56:12 (vid. Baer's note); sf. [[יִתְרוֹ]] Is 44:19; [[יִתְרָם]] Ex 23:11 + 2 t. (not Job 4:21, q.v. sub II. [[יֶתֶר]]);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: remainder, remnant (with implied inferiority in number or quality), of crops, etc. [[יִתְרָם]] Ex 23:11 (JE), their remnant, i.e. what they (the enemy) leave, so [[יֶתֶר הַגׇּזׇם]] Joe 1:4; [[יֶתֶר הָאַרְבֶּה]] v:Joe 1:4; [[יֶתֶר הַיֶּלֶק]] v:Joe 1:4; [[יֶתֶר הַפְּלֵטָה]] [[הַנִּשְׁאֶרֶת]] Ex 10:5 (J); of vessels, [[יֶתֶר הַכֵּלִים הַנּוֹתָרִים]] Je 27:19; of a tree Is 44:19 (= [[שְׁאֵרִית]] v:Is 44:17); elsewh. of pers. De 3:11 = Jos 12:4, Jos 3:12 (both D), De 28:54, Jos 23:12 (D), 2Sa 21:2, 2Ki 25:11 = Je 52:15, Ez Eze 34:18; of a rescued remnant of Israel (Judah) Mic 5:2, Zep 2:9 (‖[[שְׁאֵרִית]]), Zec 14:2; [[יֶתֶר הַקָּדֵשׁ אֲשֶׁר נִשְׁאַר]] 1Ki 22:47; [[יֶתֶר הָעָם הַנִּשְׁאָרִים]] Je 36:9, Je 36:9, 2Ki 25:11 = Je 52:15 †.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: remainder, rest, other part of people, elders, etc., 2Sa 10:10 = 1Ch 19:11, 2Sa 12:28, 1Ki 12:23, Je 29:1, Hb Hab 2:8, Ez Eze 48:23; sts. incl. a majority Ju Jdg 7:6, 1Sa 13:2; of common people (opp. rulers) Ne 2:16, Ne 4:8, Ne 4:13; cf. Ne 6:1; of land De 3:13, Jos 13:27 (P); of other inanimate things Le 14:17 (P), Nu 31:32 (id.), of years Is 38:10; elsewhere in phr. [[יֶחֶר דִּבְרֵי]] the rest of the affairs of, in summaries of reigns of kings of Israel and Judah 1Ki 11:41 + 41 t. K Ch; [[יֶתֶר כָּל־דִּבְרֵי]] 1Ki 15:23; [[יֶחֶר בָרָיו]] 2Ch 28:26. †

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: excess, [[שְׂפַת יׇ֑תֶר]] Pr 17:7 a lip of excess = arrogant speech (see VB).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in adv. phrases, [[עַל יֶתֶר]] Ps 31:24 on the basis of abundance = abundantly, as adv. accus. [[גׇּדוֹל יֶתֶר מְאׂד]] Is 56:12 great, in abundance, exceedingly, Da 8:9 [[וַתִּגְדַּל־יֶתֶר]] and grew great in excess, exceedingly (cf. yatiyr much, yatiyr men more than).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: specif. what is over and above immediate necessities, abundance, affluence Job 22:20, Ps 17:14. †
superiority, excellency [[יֶתֶר שְׂאֵת וְיֶתֶר עָ֫ז]] Ge 49:3.—On Job 4:1, v. II. [[יֶתֶר]].
